title: Frequently Asked Questions
subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about NeonCasino
noAnswer: Couldn't find the answer to your question?

neoncoins.question: What are NeonCoins?
neoncoins.answer: NeonCoins is the virtual currency of NeonCasino, used for playing our cyberpunk games. 1 NC = 1 EUR = 1 USD.

balance.question: How to top up balance?
balance.answer: You can top up your balance through the 'Payments' section using bank cards, cryptocurrencies or bank transfers.

kyc.question: What is KYC verification?
kyc.answer: KYC (Know Your Customer) is an identity verification process required for withdrawals and security.

promo.question: How to use promo codes?
promo.answer: Enter the promo code in the 'Promo Codes' section and click 'Activate'. The bonus will be credited to your balance.

games.question: What games are available?
games.answer: We have slots, blackjack, wheel of fortune and other games in cyberpunk style.

withdraw.question: How to withdraw winnings?
withdraw.answer: To withdraw funds, you need to complete KYC verification. After approval, you can withdraw funds through the 'Transactions' section.
